warnings.0-18:
⚠️ Age Restriction Notice

This tool is designed for adults (18+) who are ready to engage in deep personal healing work. If you are under 18, we strongly recommend:

• Speaking with a trusted adult, parent, or guardian
• Consulting with a qualified mental health professional
• Using age-appropriate resources for your healing journey

This tool involves complex emotional processing that requires adult emotional maturity and support systems. Your safety and well-being are our priority.
